name: 할 일 관리 Pro - 스마트 TODO 앱
description: AI 기반 고급 기능을 포함한 직관적인 할 일 관리 앱. 다크모드, 다국어, 알림, 통계, 터치 제스처 지원

screenshots.src: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 390 844'%3E%3Crect width='390' height='844' fill='%23F8F4FF'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='80' width='350' height='60' rx='12' fill='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='195' y='115' text-anchor='middle' font-size='18' fill='white'%3E할 일 관리 Pro%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='40' y='180' width='310' height='40' rx='8' fill='white' stroke='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='60' y='205' font-size='12' fill='%23667eea'%3E할 일을 입력하세요...%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='40' y='240' width='100' height='80' rx='8' fill='rgba(102,126,234,0.1)' stroke='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='90' y='285' text-anchor='middle' font-size='24' fill='%23667eea'%3E📊%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='160' y='240' width='190' height='40' rx='8' fill='white' stroke='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='170' y='265' font-size='12' fill='%23333'%3E🏠 집 청소하기%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='160' y='300' width='190' height='40' rx='8' fill='white' stroke='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='170' y='325' font-size='12' fill='%23333'%3E💼 프레젠테이션 준비%3C/text%%3E%3C/svg%3E
screenshots.label: 모바일 메인 화면 - 할 일 관리와 통계

screenshots.src: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1024 768'%3E%3Crect width='1024' height='768' fill='%23F8F4FF'/%3E%3Crect x='50' y='50' width='924' height='80' rx='16' fill='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='512' y='100' text-anchor='middle' font-size='28' fill='white'%3E할 일 관리 Pro - 데스크톱%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='70' y='160' width='400' height='500' rx='12' fill='white' stroke='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='270' y='190' text-anchor='middle' font-size='16' fill='%23667eea'%3E할 일 목록%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='500' y='160' width='450' height='500' rx='12' fill='white' stroke='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ctext x='725' y='190' text-anchor='middle' font-size='16' fill='%23667eea'%3E상세 통계 대시보드%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='520' y='220' width='200' height='100' rx='8' fill='rgba(102,126,234,0.1)'/%3E%3Ctext x='620' y='275' text-anchor='middle' font-size='20' fill='%23667eea'%3E📈 차트%3C/text%3E%3Crect x='740' y='220' width='190' height='100' rx='8' fill='rgba(16,185,129,0.1)'/%3E%3Ctext x='835' y='275' text-anchor='middle' font-size='20' fill='%2310b981'%3E🎯 생산성%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
